column1: Smoque BBQ////I don't think I had ever eaten sliced beef brisket before in my life.  But my dad insisted that it is the best
column2: so I ordered it.  I inhaled the entire sandwich (after carefully adding their tangy
column3: tasty sauce).  The brisket was very nearly as soft and chewy as the bun that surrounded it.  Incredible flavor.  We also ordered the mac & cheese on the side
column4: and loved it.  The small side order of mac & cheese is not big at all
column5: so don't plan to be all "healthy" and share it... get your own!!   It is very close to the highway
column6: so it was very easy to pick up my order to go.  You MUST go here.
